text:
Beta Testers - question :question: - the tab title tweak “site name|DM-HS” *do you think it would be valuable if this change rolled out to other parts of the HS back end* and does this way of naming/ordering the title work for every scenario or do we need to tweak it in some way?

The idea is to communicate 3 things in the title “what site you’re editing|Current tool you’re in, and that you’re in HubSpot.”

There are things we can do to squeeze long site names in, but I’m not sure it’s a great idea.

personally for me I would love to have the site name in all the titles because I work on a lot of sites and have time tracking software that grabs URLs and Titles of the tabs I had open so I can more easily and accurately log my time.

yep yep and climbing! :smile: 
As something to compare the stat to - once we hit 200 we’re at 32% of the population of developers that are in the HubSpot Design and Developer slack
that’s basically 1/3rd!

I feel like would be useful also (in the case of DM) the name of the file you have opened.
Like portalName - DM - filename.html
Also I consider that HS is not needed as you have the favicon already to identify HS tabs, but anyway two letters are not bad for me anyway

Yea- was also debating actually utilizing the fav-icon in some areas to indicate where you are.
So for example the design manager would have an icon the settings area would have an icon.
lol, we should make a banner for the extension that says “Come to the dark side” and have the background be the dark theme lol

one idea I had been tossing around in my head was what to do about sites that have long names. I have some clients that have like <http://prettylongnameslikethis.com|prettylongnameslikethis.com> Which makes it harder to see |DM-HS

I thought about running a script that would truncate the name after x number of characters, then realized I also have sites with long names which are very similar(client has several HS sites where the first 15ish characters are all the same)

So then I was like - well we could animate the title so you could see the whole thing, but then I thought that’d be annoying if all your tabs were animating the title. plus it would screw up my time tracking software a little bit.

So I guess what I’m wondering is - do you think it’s fine as is for those scenarios or should we maybe flipflop  have the DM first

DM|SiteName|HS
lol just thought of a funny idea - should get a HS employee to add the extension logo as a emoticon :shameless-extension-promotion: lol
